summary: A collection of clothing and armors converted to fit the latest ADEC body
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7063/6822351636_b5d7f93c40.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ffc000][size=5]Armor N Clothing Compilation for ADEC Body[/size][/color][/b]
Latest: 1.28B [/center]
This is a collection of all the clothing and armors converted to fit the ADEC body version 1.11 or later. These armors are not compatible with earlier versions of the ADEC body, nor are they compatible with other alternative bodies.

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7119/7021179341_bc02cbd000.jpg[/img]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]Acdale's EyeCandy Body (ADEC)[/url] v2.4 or later required.
[i][color=#ffff00]NOTE:[/color][/i] [i][color=#ffff00]The ADEC body comes with the skeleton files required for tbbp to work....If you choose to install a custom skeleton , be sure to use one that supports tbbp bones or your game will crash.[/color][/i]

[i][color=#ffff00]NOTE:[/color][/i] [i][color=#ffff00]For people that have installed the Bethesda's Official HR texture pack from Steam, please refer to the Troubleshooting section i added at the bottom of this page.[/color][/i]



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7199/7021179229_0c2f05eb76.jpg[/img]
[*]Use the Nexus Mod Manager to download and install the entire package.
[size=3][b][i]OR
[/i][/b][/size]
[*]Open the folder of the armor or clothing you wish to install then copy the meshes and textures folders to your data folder.
[size=3][b][i]OR
[/i][/b][/size]
[size=3]Download the items individually. Each item in the main package is available for stand-alone download.[/size]



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7124/6875074008_58f46bb46c.jpg[/img]

[color=#ffc000][size=4]ADEC Vanilla Collection Contents:[/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]Breast Physics Enabled Armors:[/size][/color]
Forsworn, Imperial Light Armor, Stormcloak Cuirass, Archmage Robes (TBBP Compatible), Journeyman Robe (TBBP compatible), Barkeeper ,Tavern Clothing, Hide Armor, Wolf Armor, Bandit (aka fur) Armor *all 4 variations* , Studded , Scale and Scale Horned, Leather Armor, Thieves Guild Armor , Karliah's Armor , Guild Master's Armor, Thieves Guild Variant Armor, Blacksmith Clothes, Shrouded Armor, Ancient Nord Armor.
[color=#ff0000][size=2]Non-Breast Physics Enabled Armors: [/size][/color]
Daedric Armor Corset, Elven Armor (light , normal and gilded), Glass Armor, Nightingale Elven Crafted Silver Mail, Savior's Hide, Iron and Banded Iron Armor, Steel Armor, Steel Plate Armor ( Nordplate ), Orcish Armor, Ebony Armor, Dragonbone Armor, Dwarven Armor, Blades Armor, Falmer Armor, Dragonscale Armor, Daedric Armor, Tulius Armor and Pentilus Oculatus.



[color=#ffc000][size=4]ADEC Custom Collection Contents:[/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]Breast Physics Enabled Armors:[/size][/color]
Void Leather, Pretty Undies, Diano Armor (requires daedric armor perk to forge) Chainmail ( requires advanced armor perk to forge) Ringmail ( requires advanced armor perk to forge) Tera Operative Armor ( requires elven armor perk to forge).
[color=#ff0000][size=2]Non-Breast Physics Enabled Armors: [/size][/color]
Amazon Armor (requires advanced armors perk to forge), Dynasty Armor (requires ebony armor perk to forge), Eisen Plate (requires ebony armor perk to forge), Half Plate (requires advanced armors perk to forge), Raven Armor, Skeleton Bikini (forged with daedric perk), Silverlight Armor (forged with elven perk), Succubus Armor (forged with daedric perk) , Tera Inquisitor Armor ( forged with the glass perk).





[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7201/6875073986_88a857a45b.jpg[/img]

[color=#ffc000][size=4]ADEC z Armor and Clothing Options Contents:[/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]Optional package is optional. Manual installation only. Within the package is a folder for each armor option listed below. To install, copy the meshes and textures folders to Skyrim/Data. To uninstall, delete those files.[/size][/color]

Daedric Armor (No Greaves), Dynasty Armor (Ebony Replacer), Eisen Plate (Black Color), Forsworn (Skimpy and Skimpier Versions, bouncy), Imperial Armor (No Skirt, bouncy), Nocturnal Robe Replacers (Transparent, bouncy), Glass Armor (No Skirt),Steel Plate Replacer (Replaces Nord Plate, No Chain At All and No Chain On Chest Versions), Void Leather (Red Color, bouncy), Orcish Armor ( No Skirt ) , Shrouded Armor ( with pants )(bouncy) , Elven Light Armor ( With Skirt).



[color=#ffc000][size=4]Armors That Are Only Available As Single Downloads In The Optional Downloads Section:[/size][/color]
Lady of Death Armor *aka* Skeleton Bikini (With 3D Pubic Hair) (Breast Physics)
Lady of Death Armor *aka* Skeleton Bikini (Breast Physics)



[img]http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6110/6876678058_053c4da1fc.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ffc000][size=2]Armor and Clothing[/size][/color][/b]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19855][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19855]Newmiller casual bikini v1_00 for ADEC by Newmiller[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19934]ADEC Archmage Replacer by Abusive Cotyounoyume[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21009][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21009]Dark Illusion for ADEC by Silvist[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19310][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19310]Ebony Mail for ADEC by Silvist[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27809][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27809]ADEC Dawnguard Armor and Clothing Collection by AcDale[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24390]
ADEC Tera Armor Collection by AcDale[/url]









[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7194/6875312836_11a5aa70bc.jpg[/img]
[*]Version 1.14: Updated main collection file to contain all default armors and clothing. Amazon Armor should no longer crash your game when in 1st person. Daedric Armor's skirt should no longer clip through the butt when running backwards.

[*]Version 1.14 A: Added Barkeeper clothing with breast physics to optional downloads and main collection.

[*]Version 1.14 B: Fixed a problem causing the dynasty armor gauntlets to not show properly in 1stperson on the stand alone version.

[*]Version 1.14 C: Added Tavern clothing with breast physics to optional downloads and main collection.

[*]Version 1.14 D: Added Hide armor with breast physics to optional downloads and main collection.

[*]Version 1.14 E: Added Iron and Banded Iron Armor to optional downloads and main collection

[*]Version 1.14 F: Added Steel Armor to optional downloads and main collection

[*]Version 1.14 G: Added new stand alone armor ( Half Plate ) to optional downloads and main collection
removed steel plate armor replacer from main collection but left it in optional downloads

[*]Version 1.14 H: Added Steel Plate Armor ( Nordplate ) to main collection and optional downloads

[*]Version 1.15: The vanilla armor/clothes and the custom armor/clothes have been seperated into 2 different main files.

[*]Version 1.15 A: Added Wolf Armor ( Breast Physics ) to Vanilla Collection pack and optional downloads section

[*]Version 1.15 B: Added Orcish Armor to Vanilla Collection pack and optional downloads section

[*]Version 1.16: Added Thieves Guild Armor , Karliah's Armor , Guild Master's Armor, Thieves Guild Variant Armor to the Custom Collection and optional downloads.

[*]Version 1.16 A: Added Dragonbone Armor and Blacksmith Clothes(breast physics) to the Vanilla Collection.
see screenshots

[*]Version 1.16 B: Added Dwarven Armor to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads. Dragonbone Armor is now also available as single download in optional downloads section.

[*]Version 1.16 C: Added Blades Armor to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads.
Updated Elven Armor ( added heeled boots ) as originally indended.

[*]Version 1.16 D: Quick fix for some clipping issues with the Elven Armor

[*]Version 1.16 E: Added Chainmail and Ringmail Armor to the Custom Collection and Optional downloads section.

[*]Version 1.16 F: Added newermind43's Skeleton Bikini *also known as Lady Death outfit* to optional downloads.

[*]Version 1.16 G : Added Falmer Armor to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads section

[*]Version 1.17 : Added Silverlight Armor to the Custom Collection and Optional downloads section

Added Skeleton Bikini to the Custom Collection as it was originally only available in the optional downloads section

Repacked the main Vanilla Collection : removed the nocturnal robe that replaces the archmage,journeyman, and mage apprentice robes. Replacers have no business being in the Vanilla Collection.
The nocturnal robe that replaces the robes listed above can be downloaded from the Miscellaneous downloads section it has been renamed to "Nocturnal Robe Replacer Pack"

Added the Nocturnal robe (not the replacer) to the main Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads section

[*]Version 1.17 A : Added Dragonscale Armor to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads section.

[*]Version 1.17 B : Added Shrouded Armor ( Breast Physics ) to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads section.

[*]Version 1.17 C : Added a newer version of Daedric Armor to the Vanilla Collection and Optional downloads section. Glow effects have been added to the gloves and boots as well.See screenshots for details.

The old Daedric Armor was removed from the collection and renamed to * Daedric Armor Corset * it is available for download in the Miscellaneous section.

[*]Version 1.17 D : By request , added shrouded armor with pants version to the ArmorAndClothing Options file. Located in main file section.

[*]Version 1.17 E : Glass Armor has a new style and fits the latest body , see screenshots for details. This new style of glass armor has been added to the "Vanilla Collection" main file and is also available for single download in the optional downloads section. The old style glass armor called " sexy glass armor" is still available in the old files section for those of you that prefer to use it.

[*]Version 1.17 F :
Added General Tulius Armor and Pentilus Oculatus to the Vanilla Collection.
Updated Imperial light boots and gloves in the Vanilla Collection to work properly with the texture swapping feature of the Tulius/Pentilus armor.
Imperial light boots are heeled now.

[*]Version 1.17 G :
Added Succubus Armor to the Custom Collection Main File and Optional Downloads Section
This is a light armor with stats slightly better than Dragonscale and can be created at any forge with the Daedric smithing perk. There are 5 parts to this armor consisting of: Cuirass , Sleeves , Boots , Horns , and Wings.

[*]Version 1.18 :
Added Normal and Miniskirt versions of ADEC compatible meshes for the Tribunal Robe set to the optional downloads section.
*working weight slider and supports bounce*
First download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077]Tribunal robes[/url] then overwrite with ADEC Tribunal Meshes.

[*]Version 1.18 A :
A small update to fix the missing alpha properties on the leather armor pieces...
The fixes have been applied to both the Vanilla Collection main file and the Leather Armor file in the optional downloads section

[*]Version 1.19 :
Added the first converted Dawnguard armor for the ADEC body .. * Dawnguard Vampire Armor * supports breast physics. Available **ONLY** in the Optional Downloads Section.

[*]Version 1.20 :
Added the Vampire Royal Armor to optional downloads section. supports breast physics. There are 2 versions to choose from : with the cloak or with shawl * very short cloak*.. see screenshots for details.

[*]Version 1.20 A:
Updated the ADEC z Armor And Clothing Options Manual Install file as it was missing the Elven Light Armor with skirt option..

[*]Version 1.21 :
Added Tera Inquisitor Armor to the Custom Collection Main File and Optional Downloads Section
This is a stand alone light armor comparable to glass and can be crafted with the glass perk.

[*]Version 1.22 :
Added Tera Operative Armor to the Custom Collection Main File and Optional Downloads Section
Fixed the Tera Inquisitor Armor . The num uv sets were incorrect. Added the fixed armor to the Custom Collection Main File and Optional Downloads Section

[*]Version 1.22 A :
Added Lady of Death Armor *aka* ( Skeleton Bikini ) with breast physics to the optional downloads section due to popular request ...There are 2 versions : with and without 3d pubic hair

[*]Version 1.22 B:
Removed the Tera Operative and Inquisitor Armor from the Custom Collection Main File and Optional Downloads Section as they are now part of and available in my new mod here :
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24390][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24390]ADEC Tera Armor Collection by Acdale[/url]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]Note:[/size][/color]Be sure to completely uninstall any older versions of the Custom Collection Main File before installing this new one.

[*]Version 1.22 C:
Updated the Ancient nord armor to use breast physics and the latest body shape as it was still using the old body.
Added Ancient nord armor with breast physics as an optional download.

[*]Version 1.23 :
Added Dawnguard armor for the ADEC body all 5 variants .. supports breast physics. Available **ONLY** in the Optional Downloads Section.

All of the Dawnguard DLC armor and clothes have been removed from here and placed into their own mod file here : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27809]
ADEC Dawnguard Armor and Clothing Collection by AcDale[/url]

[*]Version 1.24 :
Cotyounoyume added to credits for use of his assests from the sexy apparel replacer.
Re-converted the following to fit the ADEC body better and added tbbp compatibility.
Added Archmage Robe ( TBBP compatible ) to the vanilla collection
Added Journeyman Robe ( TBBP compatible ) to the vanilla collection

[*]Version 1.25 :
Added Apprentice Robe ( TBBP compatible ) to the vanilla collection

[*]Version 1.26 :
Added Thalmor Robe ( TBBP compatible ) to the vanilla collection

[*]Version 1.27 :
Added Monk , Warlock and Necromancer Robes ( all variants ) ( TBBP compatible )
Fixed texture swapping on the Journeyman robes and Apprentice robes

[*]Version 1.28 :
**I inteded this mod to be a bit revealing and skimpy to show off the adec curves but some armors having a g-string is just a bit over the top...Changes listed below**
Replaced the G string on the iron , hide and thieves guild armors with Panties.
Added leggings to the studded and wolf armor.
Completely redid the leather armor . New leggings and sleeves...Torso is a recolored version of the void armor from the custom collection and skinned to be TBBP compatible.

[*]Version 1.28A :
Fixed the wrong texture links on the new leather armor.

[*]Version 1.28B :
Added the missing textures for the leggings on the scaled armor.
Added the leggings to the chieftain armor.

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7245/6875312926_d2eed27f2f.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Do not upload this mod to steam workshop or any other site[/size][/color][/b]
All models in this pack are copyrighted, and belong to their original authors and copyright holders. This mod is not a commercial modification and so you can't gain any profits by releasing any parts of it for any material benefits.

The original Triss armor concept, mesh and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used with permission. The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com/

The original Tera Inquisitor Armor concept, mesh and textures are owned and copyrighted by En Masse Entertainment and used with permission. TERA is a trademark of En Masse Entertainment . All rights reserved. http://www.enmasse.com/



[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7202/6875312878_0ba71da5dc.jpg[/img]
If using any of the armors with breast physics
Be sure to install Cherry Hotalings [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url] first. It is required for physics to work. You only need the animation files.

Install this patch to fix the casting animation bug caused by CHSBHC: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15215]Patch to fix arm animation issue of the BBP system of CHSBHC[/url]

Then install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]ADEC Eyecandy Body[/url] mod overwriting any files from cherrys mod.

Next install the armors you want to use from the single downloads section or install the main collection file.


If you have installed Bethesda's Official HR texture pack from Steam, be sure to do the steps below or some of the custom armor textures included in this mod will not show

[i]Short solution:[/i]
[list=1]
[*]Disable in your launcher or remove from Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data this two plugins files:
HighResTexturePack01.esp, HighResTexturePack02.esp
[*]Activate them in your Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Skyrim.ini in the [Archive] by modifying these two lines :
[/list][CODE][Archive]sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa[/CODE]

This way, it deactivate the plugins files that override every custom textures, but activate the HR textures in your .ini files so that the textures of your mods get on the objects modified by your mods, while it keeps the HR textures for the rest of the game.

[i]Better solution:[/i]
[list=1]
[*]Delete the Bethesda HighResTexturePack01.esp and HighResTexturePack02.esp.
[*]Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=607]Skyrim HD[/url].[/list]The Bethesda Texture Pack has been known to cause more than just the odd skin problem.
author: AcDale
